summary:
This mod ads a new follower to the game with some new general Tullius armor re texture.
He is non Essential
He is based off Arthur from the movie King Arthur (2004)
He is UFO compatible
descriptionHtml:
--------Basic Info--------
This mod ads a new follower to the game with some new general Tullius armor re texture.
He is non Essential
He is based off Arthur from the movie King Arthur (2004)
He is UFO compatible
He is Located in Windhelms Palace of Kings
He is level 10
-----Recommended mods------
Virtus Imperii - Imperial Gear Re-mastered by EcthelionOtW
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by fLokii
author: Myth0is
